thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hemispherx Enters Sale/Leaseback Agreement For NJ Development And Production Facility

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hemispherx Enters Sale/Leaseback Agreement For NJ Development And Production Facility
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Hemispherx Biopharma Inc:
* HEMISPHERX ENTERS INTO SALE/LEASEBACK AGREEMENT FOR NJ DEVELOPMENT AND PRODUCTION FACILITY
* HEMISPHERX BIOPHARMA INC - UNDER TERMS OF AGREEMENT, HEMISPHERX IS SELLING THE REAL ESTATE FOR $4.0 MILLION
* HEMISPHERX BIOPHARMA - UNDER TERMS OF AGREEMENT, SIMULTANEOUSLY ENTERING INTO A 10-YEAR LEASE WITH OPTIONS TO EXTEND LEASE FOR ANOTHER 10-YEARS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
